title: Cursed Pirate Lagoon Adventure #2
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Shipwreck Cabin
rooms.description: The rotting interior of a beached pirate ship. Moonlight filters through holes in the hull. Barnacles cover the walls, and the smell of salt and decay fills the air. A skeleton sits slumped in the captain's chair, still clutching a rusted compass.

items.name: captain's desk
items.description: A weathered oak desk covered in charts and nautical instruments. Three drawers are built into the front.

items.name: captain's logbook
items.description: A leather-bound journal with water-stained pages
items.text: Final entry: The year is 1718. We buried the cursed treasure in the cave beyond the lagoon. Only Captain Blackheart knows the way. The crew's names: First Mate Morgan, Gunner Flint, and Cook Bones. Beware the curse!

items.name: old sea chest
items.description: A barnacle-encrusted chest with a skull-shaped lock

items.name: torn treasure map
items.description: A map showing the lagoon with an X marking a cave entrance
items.text: The map shows a cave entrance marked with an X. Scrawled at the bottom: 'The cave opens only to those who know: Who commands the ship? Where do the dead rest? What breaks the curse?'

items.name: rusty iron key
items.description: A heavy iron key covered in rust and barnacles

items.name: skeleton in captain's chair
items.description: The remains of a pirate captain, still wearing a tattered coat

items.name: cursed silver coin
items.description: A Spanish silver coin that glows faintly with an eerie green light

items.name: cabin door
items.description: A swollen wooden door leading out to the beach

rooms.name: Moonlit Lagoon Beach
rooms.description: A crescent beach of white sand under a full moon. Palm trees sway in the warm breeze. Phosphorescent waves lap at the shore. To the west, a dark cave entrance yawns in the rocky cliff face. Strange whispers seem to emanate from within.

items.name: hollow palm tree
items.description: A dead palm tree with a hollow trunk

items.name: waterlogged note
items.description: A note written in crude handwriting
items.text: Morgan's reminder: The captain always said the treasure would rest in Davy Jones' locker. Only gold can break the curse of the silver. - First Mate Morgan

items.name: pile of driftwood
items.description: A jumbled pile of weathered wood and debris

items.name: dark cave entrance
items.description: A foreboding cave entrance carved with skull symbols. A stone door blocks the way, with three questions etched into its surface.

password_questions.question: Who commands the ship?
password_questions.hint: Check the captain's logbook for the captain's name

password_questions.question: Where do the dead rest?
password_questions.hint: Look for notes left by the crew

password_questions.question: What breaks the curse?
password_questions.hint: Morgan's note mentions what can break the curse

rooms.name: Cursed Treasure Cave
rooms.description: A vast cavern lit by glowing green crystals. In the center sits a stone altar holding an ornate chest overflowing with gold doubloons. The cursed silver coin in your possession begins to pulse with dark energy. Beyond the altar, a shimmering portal of light offers escape.

items.name: pirate treasure chest
items.description: An overflowing chest of gold coins, jewels, and precious artifacts

items.name: golden doubloon
items.description: A heavy gold coin that radiates warmth and light

items.name: ancient stone altar
items.description: A weathered altar with two circular indentations - one silver, one gold
items.text: Inscription: 'To break the curse and find freedom, place the cursed silver and blessed gold together upon this altar.'

items.name: shimmering portal
items.description: A magical portal of swirling light that leads to freedom. It requires both the cursed silver coin and the golden doubloon to activate.

rooms.name: Safe Harbor
rooms.description: You emerge on a sunny beach far from the cursed lagoon. A merchant ship waits at anchor, ready to take you home. The curse is broken, and the treasure is yours!

items.name: merchant vessel
items.description: A sturdy ship with friendly sailors waving from the deck

rooms.win_message: You've broken the curse of the Pirate Lagoon and escaped with the treasure! The cursed silver coin crumbles to dust as the golden doubloon glows brightly. Captain Blackheart's spirit appears briefly, nodding in gratitude before fading away. You sail toward the horizon, a wealthy adventurer with an incredible tale to tell. You win!
